attributes.action: reduce the great divide which exists between ministerial and public opinion on key issues
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We feel the Government can no longer dictate ‘Democracy’ and ‘Human Rights’ as Government understanding & opinion has strayed too far from those whom they represent.  It is “a time for change” in the Governmental system of the UK.

In today’s mixed society true Democracy needs to be established where Mass public Opinion can be sought regularly, effectively and securely; then adequately reflected in key decision making processes.
